vecUnachieved.strDescription: 跳一次。解锁“滑稽演员”面具。
仅使用AK或CAR系列武器击杀100名警察。解锁AK系列武器的“KeyMod导轨”、“巨蟹导轨”与“现代枪管”。

data.strFullDescription:
PAYDAY 2是一款动作类四人合作射击游戏，各位玩家将再次扮演初代PAYDAY帮成员——达拉斯、霍斯顿、沃尔夫以及钱恩斯——并前往华盛顿特区展开一系列惊险刺激的劫案。

CRIMENET网络提供了大量动态合约，玩家们可以自由选择打劫小型便利店或绑架人质，又或是执行大规模的网络犯罪或洗劫大型银行金库，掠取巨额收益。另外既然身处首都，何不在当地打好关系，顺便参与一些政治事务呢？

每场劫案共有四名玩家可同时进行，并且随着玩家自身的不断成长，劫案难度与奖励也会不断提升。除了赚取一笔大钱成为传奇罪犯之外，还有目不暇接的角色自定义与制作系统，包括各项人物成长以及枪械和装备改造等着你来探索。

[h2]游戏亮点[/h2][list][*]抢银行，赚大钱 - 玩家需要仔细选择全队搭配，一旦劫案中情况有变，便需要各自本事与良好协作来迎接挑战。
[*]CRIMENET - 动态合约库使各位玩家可以联系各位合约人挑选心仪的劫案，这几位合约人包括乌克兰人弗拉德、油滑的政客“大象”、南美毒贩赫克特等等，他们各有自己的组织，并且经手的生意范畴也有所区别。
[*]全新升级的PAYDAY枪战机制 - 武器开火与捆绑人质的体验是你从未有过的全新感受。
[*]动态场景变化 - 一千位玩家能玩出一千种不同的劫案。每次场景中都有着些许变化或是稀有事件出现。
[*]选择你的技能 - 玩家在游戏过程中可以从以下五条技能树中累积能力：黑手、暴徒、技师、幽灵与逃犯。每条技能树均有着独特的定制化技能与装备获取，通过有效搭配便能使玩家成长为终极劫匪。
[*]面具数量再创新高 - PAYDAY 2加入了全新的面具系统，玩家现在可以选用自己喜爱的花纹与配色制作专属于自己的独特面具，从而创造出千变万化的不同组合。
[*]武器与改装 - 劫匪们将拥有自己的庞大军火库，从着重于远距离的狙击步枪与突击步枪到强调近身作战的手枪与冲锋枪等等。在你选定自己心仪的武器后，你还可以为其添加一系列包括瞄镜、消音器、前握把、准星、枪管、枪身以及枪托在内等方面俱到的模组改装，使你的武器达到最佳性能。此外还有完全基于审美意义上的改进内容——给你的爱枪换上胡桃木握把，让自己变成刀尖舔血的大毒枭范儿吧！
[*]游戏方式由你选择 - 每场劫案都有多种方式完成。你可以选择神不知鬼不觉地潜入目标地点完成任务，或是抄起家伙正面发动攻势。每种选择都会给你带来截然不同的体验。
[*]海量额外内容 - 自从游戏发布后已有70余项更新，其中包括新劫案、角色、武器以及其他游戏特性例如驾驶汽车和叉车等等。
[/list]
data.strSnippet: PAYDAY 2是一款动作类四人合作射击游戏，各位玩家将再次扮演初代PAYDAY帮成员——达拉斯、霍斯顿、沃尔夫以及钱恩斯——并前往华盛顿特区展开一系列惊险刺激的劫案。

[[218620,[["ameno_8",{"strName":"收藏家","strDescription":"仅使用AK或CAR系列武器击杀100名警察。解锁AK系列武器的“KeyMod导轨”、“巨蟹导轨”与“现代枪管”。","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/218620/5bae29565d0ea02ed4c5c1000524b974334f8dfe.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":49.70000076293945}],["how_do_you_like_me_now",{"strName":"我穿这一身如何？","strDescription":"首次装备护甲。","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/218620/3859e55f2038366c5901447682a6703c42dbc752.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":67}],["trk_mc_0",{"strName":"概不退换条款","strDescription":"完成“商场拆迁队”任务，难度为普通或以上。","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/218620/c3c63df985bc341f1f7d551831b39f6b775a68e4.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":20}],["no_one_cared_who_i_was",{"strName":"没人在乎我是谁……","strDescription":"直到我戴上面具。","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/218620/2a3afa95fa23e60082cd1655aa8db1f70e3e4ff4.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":85.69999694824219}],["no_turning_back",{"strName":"不归路","strDescription":"完成第一场劫案。","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/218620/6cbdd168efa4938c76fba92e13753291d50ff5aa.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":80.0999984741211}],["you_gotta_start_somewhere",{"strName":"千里之行的第一步","strDescription":"到达声望等级5。","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/218620/d20fb4decd312049d45d782ca4775eb73bc47cae.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":74.19999694824219}],["brooklyn_1",{"strName":"放飞自我","strDescription":"跳一次。解锁“滑稽演员”面具。","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/218620/9dca254b452c8bc477c5bfacb10e17845449989e.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":76.80000305175781}],["nbm_1",{"strName":"第一夜梦魇","strDescription":"完成“安全屋梦魇”任务，难度为普通或以上。","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/218620/1d494d86af1d313f8f713b1b5e9f8413d05e87d7.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":8.100000381469727}],["halloween_nightmare_1",{"strName":"开心的小孩","strDescription":"在“安全屋梦魇”任务中，找到正确的婴儿面具，难度为普通。解锁“快乐婴儿”面具。","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/218620/9b1b681d2fb0e69581afe7686eee5c554eac8864.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":6.900000095367432}],["trk_fs_0",{"strName":"现金还是刷卡","strDescription":"完成“四商店”任务，难度为普通或以上。","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/218620/f5ea4061c22efd8b7bed4cf522636dcfb2274392.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":20.5}],["trk_fs_1",{"strName":"店铺盗窃","strDescription":"完成“四商店”任务，难度为困难或以上。","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/218620/6ab8b7b4ba9ca50ef5ad1d45b2728b5582b07d38.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":17.100000381469727}],["yeah_hes_a_gold_digger",{"strName":"他是个淘金狂人","strDescription":"在“四商店”任务中，在保险箱里找到一根金条。","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/218620/085f060c6ccb1dde110df62deea9eaf1a29f6d3c.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":23.899999618530273}],["cac_28",{"strName":"Virus","strDescription":"与已拥有此成就的其他玩家共同进行一场劫案。","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/218620/1a4ea112bd8d0059ad360f0f6294b8dc2b4644ab.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":42.400001525878906}],["armed_to_the_teeth",{"strName":"要发票吗？","strDescription":"第一次购买武器。","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/218620/23300e62dbb2d70b851c6f7f6a3f91ad2033d85b.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":61.29999923706055}],["gage5_4",{"strName":"选择困难症","strDescription":"拥有Gage Assault Pack中的武器各一把。解锁Clarion步枪的“短枪管”、Gecko 7.62步枪的“轻型枪托”、Gewehr 3步枪的“塑料前握把”与“突击套件”、“邪恶”材质以及“恶毒”花纹。","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/218620/46467666f67523db140d3bcf13d1d545f1018b6f.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":7.300000190734863}],["gage3_11",{"strName":"有本事躲开这个","strDescription":"仅使用Thanatos .50 cal狙击步枪爆头击杀10名幻影特工。解锁Thanatos .50 cal狙击步枪的“消音枪管”。","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/218620/cb855bb6b046732882a9d1b894d1d7d979762d41.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":7.099999904632568}],["green_6",{"strName":"OVERDRILL","strDescription":"在“第一世界银行”任务中，解开PAYDAY: The Heist中的经典谜题并进入秘密金库，难度为死亡之愿或以上。","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/218620/1524cdf40961c07df66e857880b8daa4b7bafd4a.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":6.099999904632568}],["turtles_1",{"strName":"名字是给朋友叫的，所以我不需要","strDescription":"使用Lebensauger .308狙击步枪在中途不装填的情况下击杀11名敌人。解锁“百人斩”面具、“明镜止水”材质以及“妖怪”花纹。","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/218620/f5c23cb6d9c25b2d7fb3a6ef82caa15cbfb9caaf.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":5.800000190734863}],["pxp2_3",{"strName":"弄蛇者","strDescription":"使用蝰蛇手雷投掷物击杀100名敌人，难度为枪林弹雨或以上。解锁霰弹枪的“墓石独头弹”。","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/218620/938a68fcbf31648b0bfdb85f719359cd5b9c0e90.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":0.5}],["steel_4",{"strName":"黑骑士","strDescription":"使用巨剑近战武器击杀一名黑防爆特警。解锁“梅森先锋精英”面具、“锻炉”材质以及“棋盘对半”花纹。","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/218620/a96e3b60ac238285df2030586a2b0407d89c6326.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":5.300000190734863}],["rvd_8",{"strName":"团劫就是力量","strDescription":"仅使用Union 5.56步枪完成“落水狗劫案”任务，难度为枪林弹雨或以上。","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/218620/a1c81e52ae4fd5f93aaf21c76c714d8db05a1046.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":3}],["pim_2",{"strName":"飞刀又见飞刀","strDescription":"在“午夜车站”任务中，蹲伏时使用飞刀击杀8名警卫。必须完成劫案后击杀数才会计入。解锁“酒店主人”面具、“聚光灯”材质以及“虔诚”花纹。","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/218620/550a8544ebbebbd68b1ad609c91103f7fce84978.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":4.099999904632568}],["turtles_4",{"strName":"河豚斗士","strDescription":"使用浸毒武器让至少3名敌人同时中毒。解锁“白井流”面具、“折纸”材质以及“花火”花纹。","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/218620/2cbaed591bbc6c066091dd06d81c53f8f1576195.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":7.099999904632568}],["trk_tu_1",{"strName":"交通拥挤","strDescription":"完成“武装押运：地下通道”任务，难度为困难或以上。","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/218620/792f8df4688a5fc670658c20835a3cd3bb3b7a57.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":7.599999904632568}],["trk_tu_2",{"strName":"雾霾劫匪","strDescription":"完成“武装押运：地下通道”任务，难度为非常困难或以上。","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/218620/ce935dc76d8c80d63d3aef53f1acd5bc3b5d71c5.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":6.800000190734863}],["trk_tu_3",{"strName":"狭窄视野","strDescription":"完成“武装押运：地下通道”任务，难度为枪林弹雨或以上。","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/218620/3f9195263f595368d145256531c9d7539b4c737f.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":6.099999904632568}],["pick_25",{"strName":"一城雾水","strDescription":"完成“武装押运：地下通道”任务，难度为祸乱横行或以上。","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/218620/40314144485c125b1f7780c488edd490eb58a8d5.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":5.699999809265137}],["death_24",{"strName":"华盛顿永远浓雾弥漫","strDescription":"完成“武装押运：地下通道”任务，难度为死亡之愿或以上。","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/218620/0e5e86c0e0df1343d6d96633708032f66e454056.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":6.900000095367432}],["pxp1_1",{"strName":"瘟疫医生","strDescription":"身穿“医护工装”服装，使用毒性武器击杀200名敌人，难度为枪林弹雨或以上。解锁“蝰蛇手雷”投掷物。","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/218620/07e20c3644b14497c237e7e47f3d7cf4fc75f15b.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":0.800000011920929}],["cac_14",{"strName":"安全词是暴力执法与口是心非","strDescription":"使用可伸缩警棍击杀一名幻影特工。","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/218620/b62fe79f22ef17c67fd82a59f08e1f3937ba35f4.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":2.9000000953674316}],["gage4_3",{"strName":"刀尖跳舞","strDescription":"在任意劫案的任意一天中，仅使用近战武器击杀至少50名敌人。","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/218620/ff90d826541e004b3e91267257841f5cf670f99f.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":5.900000095367432}],["sawp_1",{"strName":"嗡嗡炸弹","strDescription":"身穿“接线工人”服装，使用带电近战武器击杀200名敌人，难度为枪林弹雨或以上。解锁“X1-电击手雷”投掷物。","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/218620/272834eea79e015ab0fee847ac3386893819db9e.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":1}],["pal_2",{"strName":"邪恶博士","strDescription":"在“伪钞风波”任务中，印刷并通过直升机劫获价值$1,000,000的伪钞。解锁“维京人”面具、“犬牙”材质以及“芬里厄”花纹。","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/218620/4aaf9d8c062919e39239135340c6333c3fd984de.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":6.099999904632568}],["mad_4",{"strName":"入俄乡……随俄俗","strDescription":"在全队成员佩戴“俄罗斯皮帽”面具并携带黄金AK.762步枪的情况下完成“尖峰一刻”任务，难度为枪林弹雨或以上。","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/218620/2b0d63b10c4c46f57d4ad2a6fb3822455fd4fd50.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":4.5}],["cac_18",{"strName":"德拉甘之力","strDescription":"在安全屋中，对德拉甘健身房中的拳击沙袋单次攻击超过500点。","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/218620/43921f6220f07005fa871face2236662943b1392.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":3}],["halloween_6",{"strName":"泵动南瓜","strDescription":"佩戴万圣节活动的“南瓜”面具时，仅使用霰弹枪击杀666名敌人。","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcomm 42轻机枪在10秒内击杀10名敌人。解锁“战火洗礼”面具、Buzzsaw
